sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories"> <x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category_level display_value="Junior Level">fe320462db9d23008e9357935e96190f</category_level> <category_name>Cyber Security Specialist</category_name> <education_level display_value="High school Diploma or General Equivalency Diploma (GED)">9972c462db9d23008e9357935e9619b1</education_level> <minimum_experience>Under immediate supervision, responsible for all aspects of Information Systems, data availability, integrity, authentication, confidentiality, and non-repudiation. Implement and monitor security measures for communication systems, networks, and provide advice that systems and personnel adhere to established security standards and Governmental requirements for security on these systems. Execute security policies, plans, and procedures; implement data network security measures; operate and monitor Network Intrusion Detection and Forensic Systems; conduct Information Systems security incident handling; support COOP/DR plans, and perform certification of Information Systems and Networks. Operate Electronic Key Management System, perform other information security duties, and maintain Public Key Infrastructure. Operate Host Based Security System (HBSS), firewalls, Intrusion Prevention Systems, other point of presence security tools, Virtual Private Networks, and related security operations. Certified in accordance with DODD 8570.1 Information Assurance Technician I. 2-4 years of experience required.</minimum_experience> <number>LABCAT0001090</number> <parent_category/> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 16:40:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fbc48426db9d23008e9357935e9619dd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 16:44:00</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_nnemc0_labor_categories> </record_update>
